exclude_timers comment: Use this entry as an array of regular expression strings for timers to exclude (all others will be included). Remove the '_disabled' part of the name to enable it.
exclude_files comment: Use this entry as an array of regular expression strings for files/paths to exclude (all others will be included). Remove the '_disabled' part of the name to enable it.
exclude_timers comment: Use this entry as an array of regular expression strings for timers to include (all others will be excluded). Remove the '_disabled' part of the name to enable it.
exclude_files comment: Use this entry as an array of regular expression strings for files/paths to include (all others will be excluded). Remove the '_disabled' part of the name to enable it.
